full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 LOS AN ELES COUNTY HEALTH DE RTMENT (Collaborating with U.S. Public Health Service and California State Dept. of Public Health) Date Aug 26 1970 PATIENT MAO, Betty (maiden name : Pei-Ing) To: U.S. Public Health Service Address 720 S.
